experience.title: Technology at FutureForte
experience.description: Building FutureForte. We are working on a mission to democratize career guidance for college students by connecting them with alumni. Each year around 4.09M students graduate from more than 9,342 universities and community colleges in the USA and more than 53% students are unemployed or underemployed after graduation.FutureForte empowers students by connecting them with alumni, facilitating career guidance. Students begin by creating profiles and outlining their career goals. Our advanced AI system intelligently matches students with alumni who share relevant expertise. Once an alumni accepts the connection, students can schedule one-on-one meetings at their time convenience. FutureForte transforms the career guidance landscape, enabling students to tap into invaluable industry insights and establish meaningful connections, paving the way for successful and fulfilling careers.Try it now:  of our FREE to use tools:CoverLetterGen:

experience.title: Founder
experience.description: Worked on a mission to build a platform where we can organize all expenses/invoices. Lessions learnt:- The significance of addressing a genuine problem or delivering an exceptional product cannot be overstated. Without this, it's challenging to garner interest or sustained usage. In fact, even I stopped using the app after a while.- It's essential to maintain a sharp focus on your original product vision. Excessive pivoting can lead to distraction and hinder the product's progress.://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.tufanProtocol.onboardscreen

recommendations: Dvijesh Bhatt “Mr. Shreeshiv Patel is a passionate, innovative, and dynamic student. He has been among my top-notch students of bachelor’s of Information Technology. His versatile performance on numerous fronts has been owing to his conceptual clarity and strong grasp of subjects which made him technically proficient. I remember when Shreeshiv approached me for his startup idea discussion. Despite having an internship offer from a fintech company, he chose to work on his own venture. He had a plan to build a cloud based platform for organizing and storing all invoices at one location. I wish him the best of luck for his future endeavors”
